Java.title: Java Programming Language
topics: Introduction to Java: Setting up the environment, basic syntax, data types, operators, control flow (if-else, loops), object-oriented programming (OOP) concepts (encapsulation, inheritance, polymorphism).

Intermediate Java:  Working with classes and objects, interfaces, abstract classes, exception handling, collections framework (lists, sets, maps), input/output operations (file handling), multithreading.

Advanced Java:  Design patterns (Singleton, Factory, Observer), Generics, Lambda expressions, Streams API, Java concurrency (advanced multithreading, thread pools), JDBC (database connectivity), working with frameworks like Spring (optional).

Python.title: Python Programming Language
topics: Introduction to Python: Setting up the environment, basic syntax, data types, operators, control flow (if-else, loops), functions, working with strings and lists.

Intermediate Python:  Object-oriented programming (OOP) in Python, working with modules and packages, file handling, exception handling, working with databases (using libraries like SQLite or psycopg2),  basic web scraping (using libraries like Beautiful Soup).

Advanced Python:  Working with advanced data structures (dictionaries, sets),  Decorators, Generators, Concurrency (threading, multiprocessing),  using advanced libraries for data analysis (NumPy, Pandas), building web applications using frameworks like Flask or Django (optional).

SQL.title: Structured Query Language (SQL)
topics: Introduction to SQL: Basic database concepts (tables, rows, columns),  SELECT statements (retrieving data), WHERE clause (filtering data), ORDER BY clause (sorting data),  GROUP BY and aggregate functions (counting, summing, averaging).

Intermediate SQL:  JOIN operations (combining data from multiple tables), subqueries, UPDATE and DELETE statements (modifying data),  creating and managing tables (ALTER TABLE, CREATE TABLE, DROP TABLE),  indexes and performance optimization.

Advanced SQL:  Transactions and concurrency control, stored procedures and functions, views, triggers, database normalization (1NF, 2NF, 3NF),  working with different database systems (MySQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle).

API Development.title: API Development and RESTful Principles
topics: Introduction to APIs and REST: Understanding APIs, RESTful architecture principles (CRUD operations), HTTP methods (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE),  choosing the right HTTP status codes.
Intermediate API Development: Designing RESTful APIs,  using API documentation tools (Swagger, OpenAPI), building APIs using frameworks (e.g., Flask/Django for Python, Spring Boot for Java).
Advanced API Development:  API security (authentication and authorization), API testing and debugging, API versioning,  implementing rate limiting and caching, deploying APIs to cloud platforms.

Data Extraction and Analysis.title: Data Extraction and Analysis Techniques
topics: Introduction to Data Extraction:  Understanding different data sources (databases, APIs, CSV files, etc.),  basic data extraction techniques using scripting languages (Python, SQL).

Intermediate Data Extraction:  Using specialized tools and libraries for data extraction (e.g., Scrapy for web scraping),  data cleaning and preprocessing techniques (handling missing values, outlier detection).

Advanced Data Extraction and Analysis:  Data wrangling and transformation, exploratory data analysis (EDA), data visualization (using libraries like Matplotlib, Seaborn),  statistical analysis, machine learning techniques for data analysis (optional).
